description: Checked out some live recordings of this song and it seems that it actually is played in C# standard. I stand corrected. It should be noted, however, that not every song on Master of Reality is in C# standard. I believe After Forever is in D standard, and Solitude is in E.
title: Sweet Leaf

description:
- Added vocals and lyrics
- Made corrections to the main guitar part pretty much everywhere
- Made a few corrections to the bass part
- Added section markers
Also, as a note to anybody who thinks that this should be in C#: Not all of the songs on Master of Reality were tuned to C#. The Wikipedia page states that only Children of the Grave, Lord of this World, and Intro the Void were downtuned.
title: Sweet Leaf

description: Unpopular and less accurate revision, as stated in the comments. (You know a tab is inaccurate when the uploader says "original/100% correct/best/classic/superior version".)
title: Sweet Leaf
